text: Eliezer was the second son of Moses and Zipporah after Gershom. After he was born, his parents left Midian for Egypt so his father didnâ€™t circumcise him. Then an Angel came to kill Moses for not circumcising his son so Zipporah circumcised the son and the Angel let Moses live. The son was named Eliezer. Category:Old Testament people
title: Eliezer
